mapper.update: update SEC_TEM set SECTION_ID = #{sectionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SERIAL_NUM = #{serialNum,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, POWER_STATION = #{powerStation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SAMP_LINE_TYPE = #{sampLineType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SAMP_NUMBER = #{sampNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, SECTION_ID, SERIAL_NUM, POWER_STATION, SAMP_LINE_TYPE, SAMP_NUMBER, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, REMARKS from SEC_TEM where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, SECTION_ID, SERIAL_NUM, POWER_STATION, SAMP_LINE_TYPE, SAMP_NUMBER, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, REMARKS from SEC_TEM
